queries.SET_SETTINGS: INSERT INTO `channel` (`channelID`, `channelName`, `serverID`, `serverName`, `meme`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `channelName`=VALUES(`channelName`), `serverID`=VALUES(`serverID`), `serverName`=VALUES(`serverName`), `meme`=VALUES(`meme`)
